data.message: Hello I can't use Gif box in comment box actually it does not apear in my account. I already updated the latest version of facebook app in my device but If I log out my account and log in again with my friend account and the gif box appear in comment box but my account doesn't. Why?  I already report about this to Facebook team and never replied to me.  :)

replies.message: Thanks for reporting this to us, Lin! Due to the volume of reports we receive, it may take us a bit to review it. We appreciate your patience. -Stephanie
I want to ask something more,  where can I?  Here or from messengers?
មនុស្ស ឯការ
